name: Tune Hotel - Double Six, Legian

reviews.text: When booking the hotel, honestly I had doubt about staying here. The rate was very economical (about Rp 200.000/night for double room) and first I was afraid the room would be terrible. However, my doubt was proven wrong! The room, though small, was very clean. The bathroom had nice shower. It was perfect because our plan in Bali was not to relax & linger all day at the hotel. We only needed the hotel to have a good sleep and nice hot shower!
reviews.title: A nice budget hotel

reviews.text: The hotel has a small restaurant on the G floor, not a fancy one but enough to have a descent meal that is not over-priced. One more thing I love about this hotel that, it's only 5 mins walking distance to the beach!
reviews.title: tiny rooms but clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cheap but dignified. There is a minimart and cheap restaurant inside the hotel. Super small room but clean and well looked after. Designated smoking areas. Loved the one night we stayed, it was quiet and the shower was so nice. No rats nor gecko in the room.
reviews.title: "very recomended ^__^"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I spent 5 nights at the Legian tune.
reviews.title: WORTHED!

reviews.text: very clean and comfortable hotel
reviews.title: It really WORTHED

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: go to Bali with minimum budget? do not afraid,, you still can sleep tight if you sleep here,, at tune hotel,,
reviews.title: best price for good sleep

reviews.text: with backpacker price, its a big deal.totally love it. all the staff its very kind and there always smile in their face.
reviews.title: comfort backpacker hotel

reviews.text: i check out from the hotel,, and 2 days later come back to check in again,,,
reviews.title: 1 star price for 5 star bed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: receptionist at lobby still remember us and he give us room at 3rd floor,, with the villa view,, very nice.
reviews.title: Good Backpackers hotel

reviews.text: room always clean,, and its a good price for sleeping..
reviews.title: Small and Quiet

reviews.text: The room is quite small actually
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: And i hate the fact that they dont have any TV
reviews.title: good for backpackers :)

reviews.text: But the bed is soool comfortable!!!!
reviews.title: Great location, Nice, & suitable for family

reviews.text: It was nice small room
reviews.title: Cheap but not my primary choice

reviews.text: It was pretty good hotel to stay, the room was simple, clean, cozy( used king koil LOL ) so obviously you'll get your best rest.
reviews.title: for budget hotel the best accomodation that i can afford

reviews.text: I spent 5 nights in Tune Hotel, booked 3 rooms, pay very cheap rate because early booking.
reviews.title: simple, clean, but no parking space

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: it was nice, simple,clean, great staff. located between kuta area and seminyak
reviews.title: u won't find better

reviews.text: cons: very far from kuta beach, rent a motorcycle for more convenient to move around
reviews.title: Tune in Legian, Bali

reviews.text: very small parking space for car, so you have to park the car quite far from the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with excellent location

reviews.text: Overal: very good for the price i pay.
reviews.title: Totally worth the price

aka: Tune Hotel - Double Six, Legian Bali
description: Hotel opens on 15 December 2009 - Get a 5-star sleeping experience at a 1-star price with Tune Hotels.com branded limited-service hotels. The Legian, Bali hotel features 170 private rooms with en-suite bathrooms. We believe in letting our guests know exactly what you pay for, and offer the capability to design your stay via reasonably priced pay-as-you-use add-ons. The prices quoted are inclusive of the room price, applicable fees and prevailing taxes only.
